com.gerken.gumbo.monitor.client

Class MonitorClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gerken.gumbo.monitor.client.MonitorClient

  • public class MonitorClient
extends Object
    MonitorClient represents an instrumentation helper that is able to communicate with a configured monitor server. Application code which produces gumbo metrics uses this class to persist and transmit metrics.
    Author:
    chrisgerken

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static MonitorClient connect(Map conf)
                             throws Exception
        Maintain a set of MonitorClients and return the appropriate client instance.
        Parameters:
        conf - a Map containing configuration information, usually from a properties file.
        Returns:
        the appropriate MonitorClient instance
        Throws:
        Exception

      • increment

        public void increment(String metricGroup,
             String metric,
             Long increase,
             Collection<Integer> ids)
        Increment the given metric in the given metricGroup a given amount for each of a given number of tasks. Often used to increment the pending tuple count for streams destined for specific tasks.
        Parameters:
        metricGroup - the name of the group of metrics, e.g. "Backlog"
        metric - the name of the metric, e.g. the stream name
        increase - the amount to increase each count
        ids - the destination tasks for which the pending tuple count should be incremented

      • increment

        public void increment(String metricGroup,
             String metric,
             Long increase,
             Integer id)
        Increment the given metric in the given metric group the given amount for a single task. Often used to decrement the pending tuple count for a stream on bolt execute
        Parameters:
        metricGroup - the name of the metric group
        metric - the name of the metric
        increase - the amount to increase
        id - the specific task

      • increment

        public void increment(String metricGroup,
             String metric,
             Long bucket,
             Long increase,
             Integer task)
        Increment the value of the given metric in the given metric group for the given time interval.
        Parameters:
        metricGroup - the name of the metric group
        metric - the name of the metric
        bucket - the time interval for which the metric is to be incremented
        increase - the amount of the increase
        task - the specific task

      • declare

        public void declare(String metricGroup,
           String metric,
           int task)
        Declare the name of the metric and metric group for a particular task.
        Parameters:
        metricGroup - the name of the metric group
        metric - the name of the metric
        task - the task number

      • declare

        public void declare(String metricGroup,
           String metric,
           int task,
           String taskGroup)
        Declare the name of the metric, metric group and task group for a particular task
        Parameters:
        metricGroup - the name of the metric group
        metric - the name of the metric
        task - the task number
        taskGroup - the name of the task group, usually a component name for Storm

      • topologyConnect

        public void topologyConnect(String fromNode,
                   String edgeName,
                   String toNode)
        Specify that two nodes are connected by an edge
        Parameters:
        fromNode - the name of the from node
        edgeName - the name of the edge
        toNode - the name of the to node

      • topologyConnect

        public void topologyConnect(String fromNode,
                   String edgeName)
        Specify that an edge leaves from a specific node
        Parameters:
        fromNode - the name of the from node
        edgeName - the name of the edge

      • addUser

        public void addUser()
        Increment the number of users of this instance of MonitorClient

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Decrement the number of users of this instance of MonitorClient. If there are no more active users of this instance then send a stop request on behalf of this client to the monitor server.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(String metric,
            String color)
        Specify the color with which to display the given metric on the gumbo dashboard.
        Parameters:
        metric - the name of the metric
        color - the color, in r,g,b format with each number being between 0 and 255 inclusive
